@erynnlaynneee Any time the selected option is chosen, a fee is automatically assessed based off the type of check. If you did the deposit after processing hours which is 8pm Monday-Friday excluding holidays, it processed the next available business day. -Tyler

@erynnlaynneee Depending on the type of check deposited, there may be a fee. Checks drawn on Regions are 1% of the check amount. Payroll checks not drawn on Regions are 1.5% and other checks not drawn on Regions are 4%. There is no fee if "Available Immediately" is not chosen. -Tyler
